name: Creamy Deviled Egg Salad
author: Michael Flagler
summary: A friend brought this to a party and everyone loved it. She shared the recipe with me, and I was unable to find one just like it online, so thought I would share it. Garnish with favorite deviled egg toppings (such as paprika), as desired.
ingredients: 2 ½ cups creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
12  hard-boiled eggs, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch slices
directions: Mix creamy salad dressing, mustard, sugar, and vinegar together with a whisk in a large bowl; add egg slices and gently stir to coat
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes
